table.name: Campaignee
table.description: Who is in what follow-up sequences

table.name: RecurringOrderWithContact
table.description: Recurring Order With Basic Contact Info (no custom fields)

table.name: ContactGroupAssign
table.sql-join: INNER JOIN ContactGroup ON ContactGroupAssign.GroupId=ContactGroup.Id INNER JOIN Contact ON Contact.Id=ContactGroupAssign.ContactId LEFT JOIN LeadSource ON Contact.LeadSourceId=LeadSource.Id

table.name: Campaign
table.description: Follow-up sequence names, ids, and statuses
